item.text: The goal of the Nike material chemistry program is to protect consumers, workers, the environment and brand reputation.

<il>Represents work toward a systematic, risk-based (hazard and exposure) approach to assessing toxic chemicals in a material or process. 

	• Assesses exposure potential in order to prioritize the elimination of chemicals (through reformulation or control via an RSL program) that pose the greatest risk.

	• Awards points for evaluating chemical use within a supplier facility and for using processes and technologies that reduce or eliminate toxic chemicals in materials production.
